item.title: Trump says he’s found a buyer for TikTok
item.description: A group of “very wealthy people” is set to buy short-form video app TikTok, according to President Donald Trump.

item.title: With ‘F1’, Apple finally has a theatrical hit
item.description: Looks like Apple has its first bona fide box office hit.
